name: Shreenivas Chityala

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: • Created Clusters using Kubernetes and worked on creating multiple pods, replication controllers, replica sets by writing Yaml files• Automated the process of plugin upgrade, reduced the installation time by avoiding repetition and increased the performance by 50%• Designed a code to dynamically create password for UI kibana dashboard and display when install script is run on the virtual machine• Automated the deployment of 30+ cloud servers and reduced costs by ~$3,000 each month by eliminating the unnecessary servers

experience.title: Deep Learning Intern
experience.description: • Designed a multi-class deep learning model capable of identifying Breast Cancer with accuracy up to 91%• Built the model by transfer learning using award-winning architectures for computer vision like ResNet-50, VGG16, Inception

experience.title: Junior Coordinator
experience.description: National Students' Space Challenge is the sole technical fest of its genre dedicated to promoting space enthusiasm in India. It was conceived by the Space Technology Students' Society, a student group of IIT Kharagpur. I have worked in online registration and event data management in NSSC 2018. I was solely responsible for scoring various competitions and data acquisition.
